verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w See|strong="H7200"\w*, I have \w made|strong="H5414"\w* thee a \w god|strong="H0430"\w* to \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*: and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* shall be thy \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*.

Thou shalt \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* all that I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee: and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* shall \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, that he \w send|strong="H7971"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* out of his \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

And I will \w harden|strong="H7185"\w* \w Pharaoh’s|strong="H6547"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, and \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* my \w signs|strong="H0226"\w* and my \w wonders|strong="H4159"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

But \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* shall not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto you, that I may \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* my \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and bring \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* mine \w armies|strong="H6635"\w*, \add and\add* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* by \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w judgments|strong="H8201"\w*.

And the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, when I stretch \w forth|strong="H5186"\w* mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and bring \w out|strong="H3318"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* from \w among|strong="H8432"\w* them.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* them, so \w did|strong="H6213"\w* they.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \add was\add* \w fourscore|strong="H8084"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w fourscore|strong="H8084"\w* and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, when they \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

When \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* shall \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto you, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Shew|strong="H5414"\w* a \w miracle|strong="H4159"\w* for you: then thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* thy \w rod|strong="H4294"\w*, and \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \add it\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, \add and\add* it shall become a \w serpent|strong="H8577"\w*.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* went \w in|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, and they \w did|strong="H6213"\w* so as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*: and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* cast \w down|strong="H7993"\w* his \w rod|strong="H4294"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, and \w before|strong="H6440"\w* his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and it became a \w serpent|strong="H8577"\w*.

Then \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* also \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the wise \w men|strong="H2450"\w* and the \w sorcerers|strong="H3784"\w*: now the \w magicians|strong="H2748"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, they also \w did|strong="H6213"\w* in like \w manner|strong="H3651"\w* with their \w enchantments|strong="H3858"\w*.

For they cast \w down|strong="H7993"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w rod|strong="H4294"\w*, and they became \w serpents|strong="H8577"\w*: but \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* \w rod|strong="H4294"\w* swallowed \w up|strong="H1104"\w* their \w rods|strong="H4294"\w*.

And he \w hardened|strong="H2388"\w* \w Pharaoh’s|strong="H6547"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, that he \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* not unto them; as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w said|strong="H1696"\w*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Pharaoh’s|strong="H6547"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \add is\add* \w hardened|strong="H3515"\w*, he \w refuseth|strong="H3985"\w* to let the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w Get|strong="H3212"\w* thee unto \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*; lo, he goeth \w out|strong="H3318"\w* unto the \w water|strong="H4325"\w*; and thou shalt \w stand|strong="H5324"\w* by the \w river’s|strong="H2975"\w* \w brink|strong="H8193"\w* against he \w come|strong="H7125"\w*; and the \w rod|strong="H4294"\w* which was \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* to a \w serpent|strong="H5175"\w* shalt thou \w take|strong="H3947"\w* in thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

And thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w Hebrews|strong="H5680"\w* hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* me unto thee, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Let my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, that they may \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* me in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*: and, behold, \w hitherto|strong="H3541"\w* thou wouldest not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, In this thou shalt \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: behold, I will \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* with the \w rod|strong="H4294"\w* that \add is\add* in mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* which \add are\add* in the \w river|strong="H2975"\w*, and they shall be \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* to \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.

And the \w fish|strong="H1710"\w* that \add is\add* in the \w river|strong="H2975"\w* shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, and the \w river|strong="H2975"\w* shall \w stink|strong="H0887"\w*; and the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* shall \w lothe|strong="H3811"\w* to \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* of the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* of the \w river|strong="H2975"\w*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Say|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* thy \w rod|strong="H4294"\w*, and stretch \w out|strong="H5186"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, upon their \w streams|strong="H5104"\w*, upon their \w rivers|strong="H2975"\w*, and upon their \w ponds|strong="H0098"\w*, and upon all their \w pools|strong="H4723"\w* of \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, that they may become \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*; and \add that\add* there may be \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* throughout all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, both in \add vessels of\add* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, and in \add vessels of\add* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*.\f + \fr 7.19 \ft pools…: Heb. gathering of their waters\f*

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* so, as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*; and he lifted \w up|strong="H7311"\w* the \w rod|strong="H4294"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* that \add were\add* in the \w river|strong="H2975"\w*, in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, and in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*; and all the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* that \add were\add* in the \w river|strong="H2975"\w* were \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* to \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.

And the \w fish|strong="H1710"\w* that \add was\add* in the \w river|strong="H2975"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*; and the \w river|strong="H2975"\w* \w stank|strong="H0887"\w*, and the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* not \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* of the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* of the \w river|strong="H2975"\w*; and there was \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* throughout all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

And the \w magicians|strong="H2748"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* so with their \w enchantments|strong="H3909"\w*: and \w Pharaoh’s|strong="H6547"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* was \w hardened|strong="H2388"\w*, neither did he \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto them; as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w said|strong="H1696"\w*.

And \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* and \w went|strong="H0935"\w* into his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, neither did he \w set|strong="H7896"\w* his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* to \w this|strong="H2063"\w* also.

And all the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* \w digged|strong="H2658"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* the \w river|strong="H2975"\w* for \w water|strong="H4325"\w* to \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*; for they \w could|strong="H3201"\w* not \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* of the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* of the \w river|strong="H2975"\w*.

And \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* were \w fulfilled|strong="H4390"\w*, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w* the \w river|strong="H2975"\w*.
